name: EXORCISM
description:
Explore every corner of the horror scene while avoiding the pursuit of ghosts, discover hidden clues and secrets, and find out how to eliminate ghosts! In this process according to their own situation reasonable use of props, and control the loss of physical strength, otherwise it is easy to be killed by the ghost! Realistic fog effect, create a suspenseful mysterious game atmosphere, let you embark on a thrilling exorcism journey!

Game Features

  • A variety of props with different effects!

  • Parkour can be performed with sprints and jumps, and ghosts can be played.

  • can only carry 4 powerful items, you need to collect according to your own situation, to make the most of your strategy.

  • Beautiful scenes and sound effects, let you immerse in the real and scary game world.
